questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A piece of street art
C) A building
D) A person

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A sports event
B) A quiet street scene
C) An art display
D) A family gathering

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A cloud with a face
C) A car
D) A person

What is depicted in the foreground?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) A concrete path
D) Water

What colors are predominantly used in the artwork?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and white
C) Pink and green
D) Black and white

What emotion does the cloud in the artwork seem to express?
A) Sadness
B) Happiness
C) Anger
D) Fear

A) A sun
B) A tree
C) A flower
D) A car

B) Wood

D) Metal

C) Cartoonish
D) Surreal

C) People
D) Objects

D) The sun

D) Four

D) Sad
